item.title: 【译】Shader Graph 中 的 ScreenPosition.a 的含义
item.description: 论坛 | What does ScreenPosition.a means in shader graph? Shader Graph 中 的 ScreenPosition.a 的含义？ Q: I’ve search around and checked out Documentation, but cannot understand what exactly does ShaderGraph’s ScreenPosition node’s b and **a ** components meaning. Isn’t r and g components enough to represent 2d screen position? 我已经在文档里找了一圈了，但是无法
